name: 施欣文
objective: 本課程著重教導學生閱讀文章，並藉由文章訓練學生字彙建構、語言解析及聽力會話、思維啟發能力。課中延展活動將閱讀內容與聽力、會話、寫作做進一步的連結，並引導學生將所學做有效的應用。
schedule:
(Estimated)

Week 1: Intro, Read “Why Clay Shirky Banned Laptops, Tablets and Phones from His Classroom”

Do Related vocabulary homework.

(As always, if a reading or assignment is listed here, is must be completed before you come to class. The units from American Headway, listed below, are advisory. I will assign additional American Headway homework in class; please take good notes and contact a friend for the assignment if you are absent. )

Articles in your discipline projects/show and tell

Week 11: Unit 4

Week 16–17: Review

Week 18: Exam
scorePolicy:
